A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson had every opportunity to make an incredible star wars film\, and failed spectacularly. JJ Abrams set him up so well with Force Awakens\, but every decision Johnson chose to make in this film is the absolute worst decision you could make across literally all major characters. Disney has ruined Star Wars with its corporate feel and as a Star Wars fan since childhood who grew up watching the OT on VHS with my dad\, disappointment is not strong enough a word to put how I truly feel. This marks the end of all good things for Star Wars\, as much as I don't want that to be true.
